REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V f0476 reute u f BC-BANK-OF-JAPAN-BUYS-MO 04-21 0052

TEXT.TITLE: BANK OF JAPAN BUYS MODERATE DOLLAR SUM -- DEALERS
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of Japan intervened in the market to try to accelerate the dollar's rise after heavy dollar buying by institutional investors, dealers said. The central bank bought a moderate amount of dollars at around 142.10 yen, they said. REUTER
